about_the_game:
Follow the day-by-day account of a survivor of the Z-Virus pandemic. Make decisions on your journey that will be the difference between life and death.

Z Diaries is an interactive fiction game where you read the daily diary entries of the protagonist. At various points in the story, you will be asked to make a choice, these choices will take you down different paths in the story. Some decisions will lead to a dead end. The objective of the game is to make the right decisions in the story and escape from Portland before the bombs drop.

Can you escape from Portland alive?

content_descriptors.notes: The story can lead to various deaths in which the player is often killed by zombies. None of these are described in any detail, but the game does have frequent references to violence. There are comic book style depictions of the undead.
